sites.title: Yoki (site)
sites.description: Site for Yoki, a multipurpose bot for guilded.gg. Allows you to configure the bot, view the commands, invite it to your server, and more.

sites.title: Loggregator
sites.description: Store, view, & search your logs. That's it. Nothing complicated, only what you need.

sites.title: Evalx.sh
sites.description: Code. Post. Done. You give us your code, we take care of running it. You focus on what matters, building great applications.

sites.title: Guilded.JS Docs
sites.description: Docs site for Guilded.JS. Allows you to learn how to use the library and get started with it.

backends.title: Yoki (bot)
backends.description: Yoki is Guilded's first and biggest moderation bot on the platform. Helping protect your community from bad actors, automagically.

backends.title: Guilded Shields
backends.description: A service for generating SVG shields for your guilded.gg server.

backends.title: Events Proxy
backends.description: A service for proxying guilded WS events to HTTP servers. Allows you to build your bots in a serverless environment.

backends.title: Voicechat Moderator
backends.description: A Discord bot that gives you piece of mind knowing you are free from obnoxious intrusions in your Discord voice channel.

backends.title: Sharex Host
backends.description: A simple image host for ShareX. Supports uploading and serving images.

backends.title: Webhook Runner
backends.description: A simple webhook runner. Supports running webhooks on your server from a github action.

libraries.title: Guilded.JS
libraries.description: Tools for creating bots with the guilded.gg bot API. Usable in either JavaScript or TypeScript projects.

libraries.title: Loggregator Adapters
libraries.description: Adapters for the Loggregator API. Allows you to send logs to Loggregator from your application.

libraries.title: Tomlenv
libraries.description: Read and inject environment variables from a .toml file in Node.JS. Inspired by dotenv.

libraries.title: Config Converter
libraries.description: Convert your config files from JS to JSON or vice-versa.

libraries.title: Quizziz.js
libraries.description: A simple wrapper for the Quizziz API.
